forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of wintry precipitation this morning will become mostly freezing rain for the afternoon hours. Some icing possible. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of wintry precipitation this morning. Then mainly freezing rain this afternoon. Some icing possible. High 33F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Freezing rain early...changing to rain overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 32F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow flurries and snow showers. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of wintry precipitation in the evening. Then mainly snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 2-3cm of snow and ice expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 36F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. High near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few snow showers later at night. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with some snow showers in the morning and light rain or freezing rain late in the day. High near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and raw. Snow showers early in the period will change to rain or freezing rain later in the day. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain in the evening...changing over to snow showers later. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Light freezing rain in the evening...changing over to snow showers later. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow and ice expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
